System - System control

  • Java Project Structure
  • javac
  • java
  • jar

  1. Java Project Structure

    /directory1 /directory2 /directory3 Xxxx.java 
            package directory1.directory2.directory3;
        import ....;
        // java.lang.* is imported by default.
        /* Common class defined by java.lang,
            String, Boolean, ....
            Math, Object, Thread, Void,
            Exception, ArithmeticException
        */ 
        public class Xxxx{
            public static void main(String [] args){

            }
        }

  2. javac

    javac is the compiling command.

    Compiling with external .jars, multiple sources, and a desginated output.

                javac -cp ".:../../jars/*" 
            ../src/umn/dcsg/wieralocalserver/*.java 
            ../src/umn/dcsg/wieralocalserver/datadistribution/*.java 
            ../src/umn/dcsg/wieralocalserver/storageinterfaces/*.java 
            ../src/umn/dcsg/wieralocalserver/thriftinterfaces/*.java 
            ../src/umn/dcsg/wieralocalserver/events/*.java 
            ../src/umn/dcsg/wieralocalserver/responses/*.java 
            ../src/umn/dcsg/wieralocalserver/responses/consistency/*.java 
            ../src/umn/dcsg/wieralocalserver/responses/instoragecomputing/*.java  
            ../src/umn/dcsg/wieralocalserver/info/*.java 
            ../src/umn/dcsg/wieralocalserver/utils/*.java 
            ../src/umn/dcsg/wieralocalserver/wrapper/*.java 
            ../src/umn/dcsg/wieralocalserver/client/*.java 
            ../src/umn/dcsg/wieralocalserver/test/*.java 
            -d ../../out/production/wieraLocal

    Run

                java -cp "../../jars/*:../../out/production/wieraLocal/"  
            umn.dcsg.wieralocalserver.LocalServer
